thread.title: Kyle Chandler joins ‘Godzilla: King of the Monsters’
thread.title_full: Kyle Chandler joins ‘Godzilla: King of the Monsters’

author: Oliver Gettell
title: Kyle Chandler joins ‘Godzilla: King of the Monsters’
text:
Amanda Edwards/WireImage 
Clear eyes, giant lizard, can’t lose. 
Friday Night Lights star Kyle Chandler is set to appear in Warner Bros. and Legendary’s creature feature Godzilla: King of the Monsters , EW has confirmed. 
The actor, known for playing the always inspirational Coach Taylor on FNL and favored son John Rayburn on Bloodline , joins Stranger Things breakout Millie Bobby Brown in the movie. Chandler will play the father of Brown’s character, but further plot details have yet to emerge. 
Michael Dougherty ( Krampus ) is directing King of the Monsters , a sequel to Gareth Edwards’ 2014 Godzilla reboot. Along with Kong: Skull Island (opening next month), King of the Monsters is expected to lay the groundwork for an eventual Godzilla vs. Kong showdown. 
Variety first reported Chandler’s casting. Show Full Article
